solution_line_template: Ms. Hatcher taught {third_graders} x {fourth_grade_multiplier} = <<{third_graders}*{fourth_grade_multiplier}={fourth_graders}>>{fourth_graders} fourth graders for the day.
She taught {third_graders} / {fifth_grade_divisor} = <<{third_graders}/{fifth_grade_divisor}={fifth_graders}>>{fifth_graders} fifth-graders as a substitute teacher for the day.
Therefore, she taught {third_graders} + {fourth_graders} + {fifth_graders} = <<{third_graders}+{fourth_graders}+{fifth_graders}={total_students_taught}>>{total_students_taught} students for the day.
